amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2014, LB749, § 298. Operative date January 1, 2017. Foreign corporation; amended certificate of authority.
amendatorysection.para: (1) A foreign corporation authorized to transact business in this state shall obtain an amended certificate of authority from the Secretary of State if it changes:
(b) The period of its duration; or
(c) The state or country of its incorporation.
(2) The requirements of section 21-20,170 for obtaining an original certificate of authority shall apply to obtaining an amended certificate under this section.
